content: a little mid-winter freebee to brighten your day or a little summer freebee to celebrate the sun **yarn information** note you can use any stashed 4-ply or dk yellow yarn this pattern the yarn listed here is what i used yarn a drops flora 4-ply 65% wool 35% alpaca 50g/210m yarn b drops kid-silk mohair 75% mohair 25% silk 25g/210m yarn a drops alpaca 4-ply 100% alpaca 50g/167m *1 ball of yarn a yellow 17 *1 ball of yarn b vanilla 29 *1 ball of yarn c blush 9026 **note ** *you ll only require a very small amount of yarn not the whole ball **video** there is a how-to video for how to embroider both the eyes and the beak here https //www instagram com/p/crbtl9eit_s/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link 1 and https //www instagram com/p/crln9g4ovvk/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link 2 **stockist info** drops design www garnstudio com woolwarehouse www woolwarehouse co uk needles & accessories a pair of 4mm knitting needles embroidery thread or dk yarn in black for eyes toy filling 2 stitch markers **gauge** yarn ab knits as dk to this gauge 24 sts and 32 row to measure 10x10cm 4x4in over stocking stitch using 4mm needles pattern tail body & head are worked as one piece 1 https //www instagram com/p/crbtl9eit_s/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link 2 https //www instagram com/p/crln9g4ovvk/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link
